com.krobothsoftware.commons.network

Class RequestBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.krobothsoftware.commons.network.RequestBuilder

  • public final class RequestBuilder
extends Object
    Builder for requesting HTTP connections. Use NetworkHelper.setupMethod(Method, URL) to initiate the builder.
    Since:
    Nov 25 2012
    Version:
    3.0
    Author:
    Kyle Kroboth

      Instantiates new builder

        public RequestBuilder ignoreErrorChecks(boolean ignoreErrorChecks)

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        request builder

      • execute

        public Response execute(NetworkHelper networkHelper)
                 throws IOException
        Sends HTTP request based on request builder. Connection is not closed.
        Parameters:
        networkHelper - network helper
        Returns:
        response
        Throws:
        IOException - Signals that an I/O exception has occurred.
